title: xxSPOTLIGHT Undari's Tower
text: The vile mage left behind all manner of useful recipes. Provided you have the will to use them.
blocka: xxACTION Remove a minor condition by spending xxMANA dice equal to condition value.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Great Hall
text: Fuscus has been known to entertain large groups in the Great Hall.
blocka: xxACTION Look at the top two cards in the campaign deck and place one on the bottom of the deck.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Amber Lodge
text: The repurposed barracks of the Amber Hand has become Thea's personal offices.
blocka: xxACTION Look at the top asset card on either draw pile. Draw into hand or place back on top of asset draw pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Lavender Mill
text: The great hub of Red Bank bustles with activity.
blocka: xxACTION Use the wheel of trade.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Sightrock Keep
text: At the edge of your vision, looking west, you can just make out Eastkeep wall... looking back.
blocka: xxACTION Reroll all resource dice in one pool or at one location.

title: Gray River
text: The Gray River rolls through the shade of the dense elms, carrying dark earth from deeper within the forest.
blocka: Effect: Either player may spend xxTIMBER from this location in addition to the main pool.

title: Mirror Woods
text: The dense woods appear to shimmer and twist, a byproduct of the fallen soldiers rotting beneath the roots.

title: Undari's Tomb
text: The mage's resting place has become a source of evil. The old wards were not strong enough.
blocka: xxACTION Source of the Undead. Take 2 xxDISCORD to move any number of Restless Dead to this location.

title: Outer Fernbrake
text: Simple folk band together in the shadow of darkness.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Spirit Lake
text: The clear waters of Spirit Lake reflect back the wisdom of ancestors. Feeding the lake earns the Sunriders' respect.
blocka: xxACTION Reroll all resource dice in one pool or at one location.
blockb: xxAIR May trade a Mana die for a Food die.

title: Song Bluff
text: Amongst the Sunriders, nothing is more important than honor and family.

title: Hogel Manor
text: For a Sunrider, Hogel's decorations and appointments are almost gaudy, and his demeanor doubly so.

title: Horsethief Meadows
text: Feats of martial prowess take place across the wide open plains.

title: Spirit Lake
text: The clear waters of Spirit Lake reflect back the wisdom of ancestors. Feeding the lake earns the Sunriders' respect.
blocka: xxACTION May trade a Mana die for a Food die.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT House of Copper
text: Through rings of smoke move cloaked figures willing to provide all manner of things for the right price.
blocka: xxACTION The Exchange. May reroll all dice in one pool or at one location.
blockb: xxWATER May reroll the Timber pool.

title: The Rosy Freetrader
text: A popular meeting place for both the poor and wealthy of Eastkeep.
blocka: xxACTION Cause a Scene. Move one Graycloak to the Rosy Freetrader.

title: Map Hall
text: Somewhere amongst the piles of maps and ledgers are useful Imperial plans.

title: House of Copper
text: Through rings of smoke move cloaked figures willing to provide all manner of things for the right price.

title: Guild of Secrets
text: If there is a nexus of evil in Eastkeep, it is most certainly the guild of secrets.
blocka: xxAIR If possible, move a Graycloak here from another location.

title: Lush Fields
text: Text
blocka: xxACTION Harvest. Gain 2 xxFOOD dice.

title: Salmon Run
text: Text

title: The Weird Rock
text: Text

title: Pool Beyond Space and Time
text: Text
blocka: xxAIR One character at this location is weary.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Green Haven
text: Galya, the leader of Green Haven, is a valuable and reliable ally.
blocka: xxFIRE May trade a Luxury die for a Timber die.

title: First Haven
text: Text
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 xxLUXURY to add one progress to a threat.

title: Green Haven
text: Text
blocka: Effect: All characters increase their Thievery by Gravewood disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blockb: xxFIRE One character at this location is angry.

title: Spinner Lakes
text: Text
blocka: xxACTION Spend 8 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Maplewood
text: Text
blocka: xxACTION Gain one xxTIMBER die on this location.

title: Pine Bluff
text: Text.

title: Rocky Outcrop
text: Text.
blocka: xxAIR

title: Gray Fores
text: Text.
blocka: xxFIRE

title: Azure Peak
text: Text.
blocka: xxWATER

title: Shimmerhall
text: Text.

title: Arankh
text: Text.

title: Blue Rock
text: Text.

title: Lower Wash
text: Text.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Whitehold
text: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
blocka: xxACTION Look at the top 2 asset cards, drawing 1 and placing the other back on top of the asset deck.
blockb: xxFIRE May exchange 1 resource die at any Imperial location.

title: Freeguilder Inn
text: Where everybody - every single body - knows your name.
blocka: xxAIR One character at this location is weary.

title: Dowling Farm
text: Nexus of Imperial discontent.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 5 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Whitehold
text: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
blocka: All guards (obstacles) at this location have +1 xxDISCORD.

title: Under Whitehold
text: The caverns below Whitehold have both riches and traps.
blocka: xxACTION Take two xxDISCORD to gain one xxLUXURY die.
blockb: xxFIRE One character at this location is wounded.

title: Outer Fernbrake
text: The people of Outer Fernbrake are growing to distrust Thea's leadership.

title: House of Lavender
text: Swirls of intoxicating smoke tie together the deals and favors with an ephemeral bond.

title: Graywash Spring
text: The river out of North Oaks winds its way through dense forests and hidden ruins.

title: Sparrow Keep
text: How is it that a nexus of such evil activity was allowed to grow so large?
blocka: xxFIRE Any Autarch Spies have +1 xxDEFENSE here.

title: Wrenhouse
text: Both regret and conviction in equal measure.

title: Hall of Brass
text: Zarrah greets all newcomers in the great hall of world renown.

title: Goldspike
text: Who knows what future badness brings but the keeper of secrets in a chamber of gold?
blocka: Effect: Any issues here have +1 xxTRACKING.

title: Beetle Burrough
text: You look like someone who wants to know a secret?
